about_us.title: About Us
about_us.heading: A Company To Change The World
about_us.description: Deliver innovative and client-focused solutions in exterior and interior design, labor management, furnishing, and construction. We ensure seamless project execution with a commitment to quality and professionalism in every phase.

createStunningInteriors: Create stunning interiors with beautiful, comfortable, and functional designs.
bringBeauty: Bring beauty to outdoor spaces with designs that inspire and endure, ensuring elegance and practicality.
curatedSelection: A curated selection of furniture that combines aesthetics and comfort.
tailoredToYourNeeds: Tailored to your needs, ensuring the perfect fit for your space.
laurers_description: Discover the timeless appeal of laurers, crafted to bring a touch of elegance and sophistication to your interior spaces.
baseboard_description: Our baseboards provide a seamless finish and protect your walls, adding a refined border that complements any room.
classic_molding_description: Classic molding brings an air of sophistication to your space, with intricate designs that capture timeless beauty.
efficientExecution: Efficient execution of projects from start to finish.
seamlessProcess: A seamless process that guarantees timely delivery.
highestStandards: Ensuring the highest standards at every stage.
meticulousProcesses: Meticulous processes ensure that every detail meets the highest standards.
finestMaterials: Using the finest materials for durability and beauty.
dedicatedArtisans: Dedicated artisans ensure quality in every piece.
exclusive_properties: A curated selection of exclusive properties designed to meet the highest standards of luxury and comfort.
trusted_experts: Our trusted team of experts ensures reliable guidance and support throughout your real estate journey.
footer_desc: We are a leading company in providing innovative solutions and high-quality products to our customers. Our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction drives us to constantly improve our services.
name: Name
address1: Sulaimaniyah - New Bakhteyari Main Street - Opposite Shari Jwan
info: Max Group provides expert project implementation with efficient management and a focus on quality assurance, delivering results that exceed expectations.

max_estates.title: Max Estates
max_estates.heading: Explore Villas, Houses & Apartments with
max_estates.description: Discover the trusted services of Max Real Estates. With over two years of experience in projects like Pak Towers, Shary Sharan, Sha City, Miran City, and Mayorca City, we make buying, selling, or renting a property easy. Whether it's your dream home or a smart investment, we're here to guide you every step of the way.
